mapper.select: SELECT id, NAME, sku_sn, pic_url, price, stock_num FROM sku WHERE spu_id = #{id}

select t1.id skuId, t1.sku_sn, concat(t2.name,' ',t1.name) skuName, t1.pic_url, t1.price, t1.stock_num, t2.name as spuName, t2.id as spuId from sku t1 left join spu t2 on t1.spu_id = t2.id where t1.id = #{skuId}
